articles.title: Airtel, Tata Group tie up to deploy 5G network solutions in India - Zee News

articles.title: Green hydrogen purchase to be made mandatory: Power & Renewable Energy Minister R K Singh - ETEnergyworld.com
articles.description: Under RPO, bulk purchasers like discoms, open access consumers and captive users are required to buy a certain proportion of renewable energy out of their total consumption of electricity
